Note: For other MSS see 6771; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 2601.
_description: Gospel, ‘In nocte natalis domini’, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
WO and serwe walkeþ wydeÞat comeþ of couetise and
                    pride…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And also in eorþe to Men be peesþat in riht lyuen
                    and good wille is

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Wo and wandreth walkes ful wideAnd þat gars coueytise &
                    pride…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And als to men in erthe be pesÞat haue gode wille of
                    synne to ses
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Euangelium in prima missa natalis domini secundum lucam & cetera
                    (p. 29)

CULDd11.First Lines:
Wo & wandrede walkiþ wideþat cam of Couetise &
                    Pride…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& also in erthe to men pes beÞat in riht loue &
                    good wis be
CULDd11.Note:
No break marked between this and the following text (132) in this
